DERBY-4204: Statistics not collected on re-execution of statement
This change enhances the DERBY-4204 regression test to verify that the XPLAIN table form of statistics collection is also re-collected on each statement re-execution. Without the DERBY-4204 fix, re-execution of DML statements was only resulting in a single row in the SYSXPLAIN_STATEMENTS table, while after the fix, the correct results of 5 rows are observed.
This change should NOT be backported to 10.5 and earlier branches, because it depends on the XPLAIN functionality.
